main event: A civilian reported observing a white, round object flying overhead in Springfield, Massachusetts on June 7, 1949.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 5 seconds,The observer initially thought the object was the size of a jet plane,It flew horizontally before taking an abrupt vertical ascent and later descending,The presence of a large plane at a lower altitude drew the observer's attention to the object,The report suggests the object could have been a weather balloon from nearby Bedford AFB.
sighted object: a white, round object of apparent metallic construction
witness description: The observer is a civilian writer with excellent character and a high degree of intelligence.
